A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a star wars fan and sci fi fanatic\, i can honestly say this film is awful. It was nothing more than a collage of star wars stock footage\, a messy narrative composed of happenings from earlier movies poorly placed into an attempt at a story\, and a script so soulless it could have been written by an A.I. It seems that Disney has been paying corporations and journalists for good reviews to fool the public into going to see this tragic garbage money maker. It's a sad time to be a Star Wars fan
